name: 安德鲁·阿斯特 Andrew Astor
intro: Andrew Astor became involved with acting by watching his older sister, Isabella Astor. Andrew's first feature film role came at the age of 5. Andrew has performed as a variety of characters in several movies, TV shows and national commercials. In addition to acting & basketball, he remains very passionate about working with organizations that help children, families and animals in need.
